headline.trailing: Work with top creators at scale while SideShift handles vetting, contracts, and payouts.

brand.description: Join campaigns that actually convert. We source, manage, and pay creators so your team ships more authentic content without extra headcount.

headline.trailing: Join thousands of creators earning money by creating authentic content for top brands.

creator.description: Apply to campaigns that match your style, create videos you're proud of, and get paid quickly. SideShift connects you with brands who value your creativity.

brand.title: One platform for every UGC campaign
brand.description: SideShift centralises the workflows that keep campaigns moving—from applications to approvals to performance reporting.

sourceCreators.title: Source Creators
sourceCreators.description: Reach thousands of vetted, on-brief creators instantly with filters for niche, platform, and performance.

trackPerformance.title: Track Performance
trackPerformance.description: Monitor content views, engagement, and conversions in real time so you know exactly what is resonating.

automatePayments.title: Automate Payments
automatePayments.description: Handle payouts, contracts, and tax paperwork without spreadsheets or manual chasing.

manageCreators.title: Manage Creators
manageCreators.description: Organise rosters, share briefs, and collaborate on deliverables inside one shared dashboard.

creator.title: Your toolkit for creating content that gets paid
creator.description: From finding the right campaigns to getting paid fast, SideShift gives creators everything needed to turn content into income.

findCampaigns.title: Find Campaigns
findCampaigns.description: Browse hundreds of campaigns from top brands looking for creators like you. Filter by niche, platform, and payout amount.

postVideos.title: Post Videos
postVideos.description: Create and upload your videos directly on SideShift. Our platform makes it easy to submit your best work and get approved fast.

getPaidFast.title: Get Paid Fast
getPaidFast.description: Receive payments quickly and securely. We handle all the paperwork so you can focus on creating great content.

trackEarnings.title: Track Earnings
trackEarnings.description: Monitor your earnings, view campaign performance, and see which content types pay the most in your dashboard.

brand.title: Launch your next campaign in three moves
brand.description: SideShift keeps collaborations moving with structured briefs, on-call producers, and sharing tools built for short-form content.

step1.title: Post a brief
step1.description: Create a SideShift opportunity and instantly reach Gen Z UGC creators who match your voice and budget.

step2.title: Review & approve
step2.description: Collaborate on concepts, shot lists, and drafts with SideShift producers guiding every step.

step3.title: Publish & scale
step3.description: Receive ready-to-post edits, push them live across channels, and capture performance insights automatically.

creator.title: Start earning in three simple steps
creator.description: From applying to getting paid, SideShift makes it easy for creators to turn their passion into profit.

step1.title: Apply to campaigns
step1.description: Browse available campaigns and apply to ones that match your style and niche. Show brands what makes your content special.

step2.title: Create & post videos
step2.description: Once approved, create authentic videos that showcase the brand. Upload your content directly through our platform and get feedback fast.

step3.title: Get paid
step3.description: After your content is approved and published, receive payments quickly and securely. Track all your earnings in one place.
